com.jaxson.lib.gdx.util

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaxson.lib.gdx.util.GameObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Pauseable, Renderable, Resizeable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseRenderer, BaseState, Display, Entity, GameStates, MixedRenderer, Sprite

    public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Renderable, Pauseable, Resizeable
    Abstract class to base GameObjects on.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaxson Van Doorn
